channel.title: [317]Making ::yell with colors
channel.description:
Hey guys, how do i make it so that if like that owner would yell it's in the green color or blue color. Or when a donator yells its in red. Or just how do i specify a color to a rank?
Thanks much appreciated.

item.title: [317]Making ::yell with colors
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

[quote=“Mod Brandon12111, post:5, topic:347682”][Code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@gre@[Owner]- ";
            }

[/Code]
That’s how it’s done.[/quote]

why does it say @gre@owner- Blah blah blah y isnt it green?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Making ::yell with colors
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
                String titles = "";

              
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "@gre@[Owner]- ";
                }

That’s how it’s done.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Making ::yell with colors
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Just add <shad= Color id> shades the text. <col= color id> Make text appear in this color.

player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<img=0><col=088A08>[Mod]</shad>"+p.username+":<col=088A08> "+playerCommand.substring(5));

Read full topic
